timeline.message: Feat(Issue Tracker): Enhance transition error messages to include the valid transition names
Fix(Java): Add license header to new class
Fix(Issue Tracker): Clean up variable names after TransitionHandler type migration

timeline.bodyText: Unless I'm missing something, this class looks identical to the JiraCloudTransitionHandler. Instead of forcing a hierarchy here, could we just put this funcitonality into JiraTransitionHandler?
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Checked them out, I think we should make an interface for IssueService that would be used in place of those 2 imports. But that would be out of scope.
replies.author: bamandel
